EmailTemplate.name: Lead Seeker - New Lead received MPB
EmailTemplate.subject: Seeker Rewards Program – New lead received! {!Lead.Lead_Number__c} for {!Lead.Company}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.First_Name_Formula__c},
Thank you for submitting a MyPost Business lead.
Please note that MyPost Business leads will not be called. An automated email with the registration link and information has been emailed to the customer.
If the customer registers for MyPost Business within 15 business days and has business spend within the first 8 weeks of registering, points will be awarded. For points break down, visit https://seekerrewards.com.au/how-it-works
Thanks again and keep those great leads coming.
Regards, The Seeker Team
